description: Fixed 500 error in upgrade manager, added automatic update checking to dashboard, and improved system stability.
changes: Added automatic update check notification to the admin dashboard
Enhanced Upgrader class with remote manifest fetching and caching (1-hour TTL)
Fixed incorrect include path in admin/upgrade.php causing 500 error
Improved security escaping in admin management pages
Updated system version to 1.2.0 in configuration and data files
Fixed persistence of automatic update toggle setting
Added manual cache bypass when checking for updates
